page.title: 08TRADE IN THE SHALBOURNE AREA
page.content: Within this area there is one shop - a grocery/general stores/Post Office, 1 public house also serving food, and 1 guesthouse/restaurant. There is one petrol station with workshop facility, a small forecourt shop and car hire; 1 distributive dairy and 1 basketmaker Other tradespeople resident in and serving the village are: 3 builders, 1 interior decorator, 1 hairdresser, 1 contract gardener, 1 mechanic/handy- man. Businesses in the area but trading outside:- 1 decor consultant, 1 fancy goods mail order firm, 1 precision engineering firm, 1 systems engineering company, 1 oil painting restorer and 1 racing stud stables. A window cleaner lives just outside the area but works within it, and the village is served by three mobile traders: a greengrocer, a fishmonger and a fish-and-chip van.
